description:
PodCatcher Deluxe is a full-featured audio podcatcher designed to manage your podcast content easily whilst on the go.
Amongst basic playback functionality, PodCatcher Deluxe features a sophisticated three column layout. One contains the podcast list, another displays episodes currently available (for a selected feed) and the latter column clearly displays podcast episode descriptions. Multiple feeds are also supported within this simple design and can conveniently be searched while playing. The integrated podcast finder gets you going quickly.
In addition, this premium version allows downloading of episodes, resumes to the last play position on restart and adds support for episode filters (new/old episodes). There is also a playlist option for uninterrupted back to back playback.
For video streaming and download try Video PodCatcher Deluxe! See http://www.podcatcher-deluxe.com for more information!
This software is available in English, German, French, and Spanish.
versionNote: Improved dashboard integration, better download failure behaviour
